snippet: On Wednesday, Zambia and Ivory Coast advanced to Sunday's final of the Africa Cup of Nations.
abstract: On Wednesday, Zambia and Ivory Coast advanced to Sunday's final of the Africa Cup of Nations.
lead_paragraph: Zambia, which saw most of its national team players killed in a plane crash in 1993, then advanced to the final of the 1994 Africa Cup of Nations, upset favored Ghana Wednesday to advance to this year's final.

headline.main: Africa Cup of Nations: Zambia and Ivory Coast in Final
